questions.question: How do I schedule an appointment?
questions.answer: You can schedule an appointment by logging into your account, navigating to the 'Appointments' section, and clicking on 'Schedule New Appointment'.

questions.question: How do I reset my password?
questions.answer: To reset your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and follow the instructions sent to your email.

questions.question: Are my medical records secure?
questions.answer: Yes, we use industry-leading encryption and security practices to ensure your medical records and personal information are always protected.

questions.question: How can I find a specific doctor?
questions.answer: You can find doctors by using the search function on our 'Find Doctors' page. You can filter by specialty, location, and availability.
